metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14941 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Jaspersoft JasperReports 4.7 suffers from a saved credential disclosurevulnerability, which allows a remote authenticated user to retrieve storedData Source passwords by accessing flow.html and reading the HTML sourcecode of the page reached in an Edit action for a Data Source connector.

criterions.comment: jasperreports: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
